title: Refrigerator Ice Maker Bin Temperature Sensor
description: Refrigerator Ice Maker Bin Temperature Sensor ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 14 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11755842 Manufacturer Part Number WPW10511923 This bin temperature sensor is for ice makers. The bin temperature sensor monitors the temperature in the ice maker bin and sends the temperature reading to the electronic control board. Disconnect the power before installing this part. Wear work gloves to protect your hands.

installationInstructions.author: Travis from N CHESTERFLD, VA
installationInstructions.title: Ice bin overfilling
installationInstructions.content: I'm an hvac/r technician, and regularly work on ice machines.  Begin my pulling the white over beneath the control panel.  It snaps in place so pull on the bottom then left out.  1/4 nut driver is all you need, and remove the screw holding the bin thermistor clip to the side.  Up to the right , beneath the control panel, behind the plastic panel you previously removed is the mollex connector.  Unplug the thermistor and follow instructions in reverse to reinstall.
